description:
Optional self-hosted server for a fully autonomous setup.


- Fixed issues with authentication (signing in) on RU Server in Viewer that caused authentication sessions to be interrupted.
- New connection panel on the Host side. It now shows the list of connection modes actively being used by users/admins connected to this Host. You can also terminate any session or cancel authorization. For paid licenses, this panel can be hidden or restricted.
- Enhanced Host tray icon indication. The icon now shows a green dot overlay if thereâ€™s an active authorization on this machine or if scheduled screen recording is running.
- The MSI Configurator now allows setting startup protection (CAPTCHA/PIN) for all package types except MSI.
- New disclaimer message displayed when launching the Agent and Host EXE installers.
- Support for a simplified SPN template to ease Kerberos authorization setup.
- Added the ability to specify a directory and address book in the Host settings (via Configurator) for automatic connection import on the Server.
- Improved two-factor authentication behavior.
- Fixed an issue with setting a password for Host settings during package configuration.
- Fixed certain issues with sending SMTP notifications through some providers.
- New command-line options for the Host to display or generate a new Internet-ID. Use -printid to display and -genid to generate. Example: start /wait rutserv.exe -printid.
- The Server now includes a tab to view the list of connected Viewers.
- Improved auto-import feature.
- Minor fixes and improvements.
